# HUD::HUD_FORCE_WEAPON_WHEEL

## Summary
Turns forcing the weapon wheel bOnOrOff

## Parameters
* **BOOL** onOrOff: TRUE, force the wheel on FALSE, stop forcing the wheel on (does NOT actually force the wheel off)

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Forces the weapon wheel to show/hide.
